title: The historie of Calanthrop and Lucilla Conspicuously demonstrating the various mutabilities of fortune in their loves, with every severall circumstance of ioyes and crosses, fortunate exploites, and hazardous adventures, which either of them sustained before they could attaine the prosperous event of their wished aimes. By Iohn Kennedie.
author: Kennedy, John, fl. 1626.
publisher: Printed by Iohn Wreittoun, and are to be sold at his shop a little beneath the Salt-Trone,
